title: Takeout Box
description: A tall, folded, paper carton, usually white, as used for takeout/takeaway food at Western Chinese restaurants. Most platforms depict chopsticks inside its open lid, labeled with a red, multi-tiered, traditional Chinese building. Also called an oyster pail.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's takeout box emoji is a charming, miniature representation of a classic Chinese takeout container, complete with its signature folded paper construction and a wire handle. On Apple devices, its glossy finish and subtle 3D shading make it look almost edible, inviting the idea of a delicious meal. This emoji is universally recognized for symbolizing food, dining out, or ordering in, perfectly capturing the convenience of enjoying a meal on the go, as rendered with Apple's distinctive visual style.
